  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILevel1Controller, ILevel2Controller, OptionalNamable<CE>, OptionalTokenable<CE>, Resettable, Typed, Configurable, Specifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dialog

    public abstract class ConfigurationElement<CE extends ConfigurationElement<?>>
extends ConfigurableElement<CE>
    A configurable elemenet is an element that can have a configuration.
